name: Eagle
description: Eagle helps you become a happier, better designer. A new way to collect, search and organize your image files in a logical way and all in one place.
author: ogdesign
license: Copyright (C) 2022 ogdesign, Inc. All right reserved.

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run jsc && electron .
scripts.build-win: npm run build && npm run jsc && node build_script/package.js
scripts.build-mac: npm run build && npm run jsc && node build_script/package-mac.js
scripts.build-arm64: npm run build && npm run jsc && node build_script/darwin-arm64.js
scripts.scss: concurrently -m 30 "node-sass app/css/trial-modal.scss app/css/trial-modal.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/registration.scss app/css/registration.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/icons.scss app/css/icons.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/style_lightgray.scss app/css/style_lightgray.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/style_purple.scss app/css/style_purple.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/style_dark.scss app/css/style_dark.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/style_dark-blue.scss app/css/style_dark-blue.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/style_light.scss app/css/style_light.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/style_gray.scss app/css/style_gray.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/preferences.scss app/css/preferences.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/color-picker.scss app/css/color-picker.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/about.scss app/css/about.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/collect.scss app/css/collect.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/image-editor.scss app/css/image-editor.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/image-viewer_lightgray.scss app/css/image-viewer_lightgray.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/image-viewer_light.scss app/css/image-viewer_light.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/image-viewer_gray.scss app/css/image-viewer_gray.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/image-viewer_dark.scss app/css/image-viewer_dark.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/image-viewer_dark-blue.scss app/css/image-viewer_dark-blue.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/image-viewer_purple.scss app/css/image-viewer_purple.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass app/css/progress.scss app/css/progress.css --output-style compressed"
scripts.css: node-sass app/css/trial-modal.scss app/css/trial-modal.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/registration.scss app/css/registration.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/icons.scss app/css/icons.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/style_lightgray.scss app/css/style_lightgray.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/style_purple.scss app/css/style_purple.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/style_dark.scss app/css/style_dark.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/style_dark-blue.scss app/css/style_dark-blue.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/style_light.scss app/css/style_light.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/style_gray.scss app/css/style_gray.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/preferences.scss app/css/preferences.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/color-picker.scss app/css/color-picker.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/about.scss app/css/about.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/collect.scss app/css/collect.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/image-editor.scss app/css/image-editor.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/image-viewer_lightgray.scss app/css/image-viewer_lightgray.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/image-viewer_light.scss app/css/image-viewer_light.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/image-viewer_gray.scss app/css/image-viewer_gray.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/image-viewer_dark.scss app/css/image-viewer_dark.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/image-viewer_dark-blue.scss app/css/image-viewer_dark-blue.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/image-viewer_purple.scss app/css/image-viewer_purple.css --output-style compressed & node-sass app/css/progress.scss app/css/progress.css --output-style compressed
